title: List of all Androidfilter   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidfilter   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: FabulousFilter
repoList.description: Android library to animate Floating Action Button to Bottom Sheet Dialog and vice-versa

repoList.name: ExoPlayerFilter
repoList.description: This library uses OpenGL Shaders to apply effects on ExoPlayer video at Runtime

repoList.name: GPUVideo-android
repoList.description: This library apply video filter on generate an Mp4 and on ExoPlayer video and  Video Recording with Camera2.

repoList.name: instagram-filters-jhlabs-android
repoList.description: Implementation of some Instagram filters using jhlabs library for android

repoList.name: orangesignal-android-camera
repoList.description: Android Camera Library + GPUImage GLSL filters

repoList.name: Mp4Composer-android
repoList.description: This library generate an Mp4 movie using Android MediaCodec API and apply filter, scale, trim, transcode, crop, timeScale, mute and rotate Mp4.

repoList.name: photofilter
repoList.description: A simple easy to use library that lets you edit pictures on the fly with easy. Photo filter lets you apply a large number of filters all while maintaining maximum image quality. Supports Android 2.3 and higher.

repoList.name: PhotoEditor
repoList.description: A Photo Editor library with simple, easy support for image editing using paints,text,filters,emoji and Sticker like stories.

repoList.name: FilterLibrary
repoList.description: Android filter library -This library has 16 filters which can be applied to image bitmaps.

repoList.description: Android library to animate Floating Action Button to Bottom Sheet Dialog and vice-versa
